src:
Solskjaer Diklaim Tidak Puas Dengan Aktivitas Belanja Pemain Manchester United
04 Nov 2019, 17:28 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Legenda Manchester United Peter Schmeichel meyakini Ole Gunnar Solskjaer tidak merasa puas dengan aktivitas belanja klub pada musim panas 2019 kemarin.
United tidak begitu aktif di bursa transfer musim panas itu. Mereka cuma mendatangkan tiga pemain baru.
Dua pemain di posisi bek yakni Harry Maguire dan Aaron Wan-Bissaka. Sementara satu lagi di posisi winger yakni Daniel James.
Perekrutan tiga pemain itu diyakini bisa memperbaiki performa Setan Merah. Khususnya dengan hadirnya Maguire dari Leicester City.
text:
Solskjaer Claimed Not Satisfied With Manchester United Players Shopping Activity
Nov 04 2019, 17:28 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester United legend Peter Schmeichel believes Ole Gunnar Solskjaer is not satisfied with the club's shopping activities in the summer of 2019 yesterday.
United were not very active in the summer transfer market. They only brought in three new players.
Two players in the position of defender namely Harry Maguire and Aaron Wan-Bissaka. While one more in the position of winger, Daniel James.
The recruitment of three players is believed to improve the performance of the Red Devils. Especially with the presence of Maguire from Leicester City.
